data.title: Virtual Human Imaging
data.meta_description: Given 3D scanned anthropological models and the physical parameters of a microwave imaging system, we develop a virtual human surface imagery system with a finite multi-physics surface model. The concealed object detection algorithms are developed based on the wave...
